description:
HyperText Markup Language commonly referred to as HTML is the standard markup language used to create web pages. HTML is the first basic step which is required for development of web pages.

HTML is said to be the first language through which we can add videos audios and many other media files.

Learning HTML is not such a big task and this course is designed in such a step by step format that you will find HTML as the easiest language.

This course covers 39 lectures which provides you with both theoretical and practical approach which not only increase your programming practice about this language but also gives the uses and needs that why we are learning this topic.

HTML elements form the building blocks of all websites HTML allows images and objects to be embedded and can be used to create interactive forms It provides a means to create structured documents by denoting structural semantics for text such as headings paragraphs lists links quotes and other items

Without learning HTML you cannot move further to secure your future as a website developer. So from this course you will become an expert from the beginner in less than 2 hours.
title: HTML- From basics to live project.
